keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Officials Tuesday suspended the search for 12 Marines who were aboard two helicopters that crashed off Hawaii last week.

headline.print_headline: Hawaii: Search for Marines Is Suspended
headline.main: Hawaii: Search for Marines Is Suspended

snippet: Officials Tuesday suspended the search for 12 Marines who were aboard two helicopters that crashed off Hawaii last week.
abstract: Hawaiian officials suspend search for 12 missing crew members aboard two helicopters that crashed in area; memorial service is planned at Marine Corps Base Hawaii in their honor; names of crewmen listed.
